title: Create WorktreeEnvManager to handle .env and ports
description: Adds a system to generate unique .env files and start local servers for each worktree.
userStories: As an agent, I need a predictable env to test against.
As a developer, I want to avoid port collisions when launching test servers.
successCriteria: Each worktree receives a dynamically generated .env file
Used ports are tracked and incremented
